title: Stream: King Krule – 6 Feet Beneath the Moon
content:
Eighteen year old Archy Marshall aka King Krule has made his debut LP available for streaming In a rather fitting and fantastically ambitious manner.

Playing alongside live footage from CCTV cameras in London, each feed is accompanied by a track from 6 Feet Beneath The Moon, beautifully holding up a mirror to the environment amidst which the record has drawn inspiration.

Released 24 August (on Marshall’s nineteenth birthday), it’s an engrossing listen, and interesting representation of the gritty reality that is growing up in London as an adolescent.

Check out the stream below, featuring the previously heard Easy Easy, Out Getting Ribs and Neptune Estate.

If the above embed doesn’t work, then stream in on King Krule’s website.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d40
